channel.title: Trade
channel.description: how do i make it that admin can trade with normal players

item.title: Trade
item.dc:creator: @cocky cocky
item.description:
@cocky wrote:

ok, i had this same problem, but i was trying to change it so that the admin cud trade… go to ptrade.java then search for p.rights=2 do not just copy this into ur search… cuz im not sure, but over there it shud be something like this, (not sure!)
if p.rights=2 trade; cancel = true
i just made that on the spot… just look for something on those lines, or more.

Read full topic

item.title: Trade
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

Admins should already be allowed to trade with normal players…If you can’t you might want to look for a code that blocks that because trade shouldn’t be effected with normal players.

Search in client.java:
rights == 3
OR
rights = 3

Until you see something that looks like it would block trades with normal players.

Read full topic
